alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Johnson; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 10:50AM EST until March 11 at 3:15AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River, Flatrock River, Big Blue River, Driftwood River, and the East Fork White River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Driftwood River near Edinburgh. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Extensive flooding along Big Blue River in Edinburgh area. In Johnson County CR 650S between CR 700E and CR 800E flooded. Water approaching or on CR 700E near CR 775S. Irwin Park in Edinburgh extensively flooded. Water affecting one residence in Shelby County at CR 900W and CR 1000S. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EST Tuesday was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1045 PM EST.
